title: Record biweekly chats?
body:
Some members can't make the biweekly all-hands. I'd like to propose recording the audio from member-halls, and storing them in google drive. 

*How to do it?*
Mods of dOrg discord channel will install Craig https://craig.chat/home/ and then members will add

*Things to consider*
- Everyone is aware this call is recorded, and if a guest speaker (or other individual) wants to opt out, we'll remove craig from the channel
- Audio will be stored in the google drive for two weeks - everyone w/ active builder status will have access for personal use 

*Pricing*
It's free
choices: Yes, but OBS instead of Craig
author: 0x438b5e448a9E34e67794FCCe2545dEa4660A69c6
